TextBlock.Text: DAHLIA: I have something exciting to tell you all!
DAHLIA: On my last visit to the purple planet, I spotted something through the thick cloud cover on the south pole. A large crater made itself known!
DAHLIA: This allowed me to descend into the hollowed-out middle of the planet, and it turns out what I thought was the surface was just a shell.
FERN: Dahlia, This is monumental! I'll get the shuttle ready for further exploration.
BASIL: I wonder how it stays above the core, then.
TULIP: Intresting! Do you suppose life is possible in the hollow?
